name: Thunder Weathery Pattern
desc:
You can only control 1 "Thunder Weathery Pattern". "Weathery" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zone in the same column as this card, and Main Monster Zones adjacent to that zone, gain this effect.
‚óè At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish this card; return that opponent's monster to the hand.
